name: HELLENIC UNION OF INDUSTRIAL CONSUMERS OF ENERGY
goal:
UNICEN represents Greek industries for which energy is a significant proportion of production costs and therefore a key factor of competitiveness at international level .

UNICEN's 25 member companies are the backbone of the domestic industry and represent various sectors (cement , steel , non-ferrous metals , paper , fertilizers and other) with a common characteristic high energy intensity , ie high energy consumption per unit of output.

UNICEN represents approximately 50 % of domestic industrial energy consumption .

Since 2011 , UNICEN is a member of IFIEC Europe, the European Confederation of Industrial Energy Consumers (www.ifieceurope.org).
euInitiatives: EU Energy Directives Winter package energy union target model European inter connectors electricity and gas
